com.communote.common.util

Class HTMLHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.common.util.HTMLHelper

  • public final class HTMLHelper
extends Object
    Helper class for HTML processing.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      Regex class of line terminators.
      static Set<String> NODES_TO_REMOVE_WHEN_EMPTY
      Names of HTML tags whose nodes should be removed when they do not have a body.

    • Field Detail

      • NODES_TO_REMOVE_WHEN_EMPTY

        public static final Set<String> NODES_TO_REMOVE_WHEN_EMPTY
        Names of HTML tags whose nodes should be removed when they do not have a body.

      • LINE_TERMINATORS_REGEX_CLASS

        public static final String LINE_TERMINATORS_REGEX_CLASS
        Regex class of line terminators. Note: using this class for line break removal/replacement is not save because of '\r\n' combination which must be checked separately.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • closeBrTags

        public static String closeBrTags(String htmlContent)
        Converts br tags to the XHTML compatible form.
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the content to process
        Returns:
        the processed content

      • containsNonEmptyTextNodes

        public static boolean containsNonEmptyTextNodes(String htmlContent)
        Tests whether the provided HTML contains non-empty text nodes.
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the HTML to test
        Returns:
        false if htmlContent is null or contains only whitespace (including Unicode codepoint 160) as text, true otherwise

      • convertHTMLListToText

        public static String convertHTMLListToText(String htmlContent)
        Converts HTML lists to readable plain text representations. The lists can be nested ol or ul elements.
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the HTML content to parse for lists
        Returns:
        the converted content

      • convertXmlSerializedHtmlToLegalHtml

        public static String convertXmlSerializedHtmlToLegalHtml(String xmlSerializedHtml)
        Does some cleanup to convert HTML generated by serializing an HTML DOM with an XML processor to legal HTML.
        Parameters:
        xmlSerializedHtml - the HTML that was serialized by an XML processor
        Returns:
        the cleaned HTML

      • encapsulateAttributesInQuotes

        public static String encapsulateAttributesInQuotes(String htmlContent)
        Some tools (e.g. M$-Outlook) create HTML where single-word attribute values are not encapsulated in quotes. Although this is legal HTML, it is not parsable by an XML parser. This method adds the quotes (double quotes).
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - The content as HTML.
        Returns:
        the repaired content

      • htmlToPlaintext

        public static String htmlToPlaintext(String htmlContent)
        A simple helper which converts HTML to plain text which works similarly to StringEscapeHelper.removeHtmlMarkup(String), but tries to preserve linebreaks by replacing closing paragraphs and br elements with newlines. More over list items are surrounded by minus and newline character.
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the HTML content
        Returns:
        the plain text version

      • htmlToPlaintextExt

        public static String htmlToPlaintextExt(String htmlContent,
                                        boolean convertLists)
        Helper method similar to htmlToPlaintext(String) with the difference that it uses a more advanced approach to replace HTML lists (namely by invoking convertHTMLListToText(String)). This method also converts hyperlinks into text representation using UrlHelper.convertAnchorsToString(String).
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the HTML content
        convertLists - whether to convert HTML lists. If true lists will be converted by invoking convertHTMLListToText(String). If false, list entries will only be separated by line breaks.
        Returns:
        the plain text version

      • plaintextToHTML

        public static String plaintextToHTML(String plainText)
        A simple helper which converts a plain text string to HTML by encapsulating all lines with paragraphs and escapes characters reserved in XML.
        Parameters:
        plainText - the plain text
        Returns:
        the converted string

      • removeComments

        public static String removeComments(String htmlContent)
        Removes all HTML comments.
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the HTML content
        Returns:
        the content without comments

      • removeHeadElement

        public static String removeHeadElement(String htmlContent)
        Strips the head element with all children from an HTML string.
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the content to process
        Returns:
        the htmlContent without meta tags

      • removeNamespaces

        public static String removeNamespaces(String htmlContent)
        Removes all namespace definitions and the nodes using these namespaces. The body of the nodes will be kept.
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the content to process
        Returns:
        the cleaned content

      • removeUnclosedMetaElements

        public static String removeUnclosedMetaElements(String htmlContent)
        Remove open meta elements.
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the HTML content
        Returns:
        the cleaned content

      • stripLinebreaks

        public static String stripLinebreaks(String htmlContent)
